Probabilitats dels pròxims partits
<br>
<br>
```{r echo=F}
library(kableExtra)

partits <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/games-primera.csv")

kable(partits, digits = 1, align = "c", row.names = FALSE, col.names = c("Jornada", "Equip", "Guanyar", "Empatar", "Guanyar", "Equip"))  %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("responsive"), fixed_thead = T) %>%
  add_header_above(c("2019-20" = 1, "Local" = 2, " " = 1, "Visitant" = 2), background = "white") %>%
  column_spec(2, bold = T, color = "#303030") %>%
  column_spec(6, bold = T, color = "#303030") %>%
  row_spec(which((partits$week %% 2) == 0), background = "#F9F9F9") %>%
  row_spec(which((partits$week %% 2) != 0), background = "white") %>%
  kable_styling(fixed_thead = T) %>%
  footnote(general = format(Sys.time(), "%d %b %Y, %X"), general_title = "Actualitzat:", footnote_as_chunk = T)
```
